text:
Hi everybody, I have an issue that you probably know:
I need to add an id to a form in the template of the page or in the module.
With the old editor it was really simple, but how can I do it now?
I've tried to inserted it in the code but id doesn't appear in the code of the page.
Thank you for your help!

Hello all, happy Monday! Does anyone know if there are any near term plans to add more CMS type property fields to custom objects? Specifically rich-text fields & image fields. I am using custom objects to create dynamic pages but am running into limitations because of the property field types available. <@U7SL518D6>, Do you know?

Hey everyone. Any trick to previewing/using the 404.html/500.html system templates. When I hit a 404 it's just the generic boiler version even though I have updated both in my template. Thanks in advance!
